alert.note: Alert for Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 7:48PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Richmond, Lexington and Aiken Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 748 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Dreher Island State Park to 10 miles north of Aiken State Park to Belvedere. Movement was east at 20 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Aiken Mall, Oak Grove, Red Bank, Augusta, Clearwater, Belvedere, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, New Ellenton, Gaston, West Columbia Riverwalk, Citizens Park, Augusta National Golf Club, USC Aiken, and SC State Farmer`s Market. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 198 and 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 8, between mile markers 17 and 26, and between mile markers 30 and 63. Interstate 26 between mile markers 109 and 119. Interstate 520 in Georgia near mile marker 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
